title: The Brady Kids
overview: The series revolved around the adventures of the six Brady children and their animal friends, Mop Top, their dog; Ping and Pong, two pandas who speak a strange, Chinese-based jibberish; and Marlon, a Mynah bird with magic powers. Their main hangout was the family treehouse. The Bradys were also a musical group and each episode featured at least one group performance.
